This oil, which is pressed from vrock spores and mixed with a combination of acacia ash and thistle seeds, seeps into the skin of living creatures, initially inspiring irritability that unpredictably manifests as berserk rage.

Activate A Interact (Contact)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:37]

Onset [[/r 1d6]] minutes

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[4d6[mental]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Quickened]{Quickened 1}, attack nearby creatures as if @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Confused] (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[6d6[mental]] damage, attack nearby creatures as if confused (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[8d6[mental]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Fatigued], attack nearby creatures as if confused (1 round)
